thread.title: Justin Bieber's squad go into twerking overload in the dance video for 'Sorry' - Music
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber's squad go into twerking overload in the dance video for 'Sorry' - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Justin Bieber's squad go into twerking overload in the dance video for 'Sorry' - Music
text: Justin Bieber's squad have a twerking party that will you leave dumbfounded in the funky dance video for 'Sorry'.Having unveiled the new single on US radio today (October 22), the popstar turned to a crew of dancers to bust a move (or 2… or 20) in celebration.'Sorry' will be available for fans to download at midnight ET if they pre-order his comeback album Purpose.Bieber previewed the Skrillex-assisted 'Sorry' on Tuesday (October 20) with a little help from Vine star King Bach and US first lady Michelle Obama.Purpose officially launches on November 13 – the same day as the much anticipated One Direction record Made in The AM. © Getty Images / Steve Granitz/WireImage Bieber is upping his promotional game for his first record in three years by travelling overseas to the MTV Europe Music Awards this weekend.Earlier in the year, Bieber topped singles charts on both sides of the Atlantic with the smash hit 'What Do You Mean?'.
